Reviews.Title: Fuji Z20 is a nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: c681

} } } Length:: 0:46 MinsHere is a nice raw, unedited video file straight from this camera's memory card of a dim low light dance ballroom.

Reviews.Title: Not just for Generation "Z"
Reviews.Author: P. Allgood "PMA"
Reviews.Content: This camera was primarily intended for the younger crowd, but I will definitely recommend it to Anyone of Any Age. Its very stylish if you care about that, and the features are spectacular. With the up to 10MP resolution, and the highly advanced face detection, and the fact that the video clips are in MP4 format make this camera a must have for the occasional picture taker of any age. The bundled software is ok, though I prefer to just use Windows Photo Gallery to import and format the SD card. Of course there are many many more features to speak of, but I want to keep this short. Overall, It's an A+. Super sharp photos, clean and smooth video (With Sound) and a fairly sharp 2.5" LCD. Its one of those 'Pull it out of your pocket, slide it open and shoot" That fast, that easy. Oh, and by the way, forget about AA or AAA batteries, This has a cell-phone like Li-Ion battery that lasts and lasts, and comes with charger (No USB charging though) If you do choose this model, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Better than It Looks
Reviews.Author: L. Rushforth
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small and simple camera, and I am very happy with the Z20fd.  This camera looks too small and to simple to be as good as it is.UPSIDE:  Small size.  Simple operation.  I recently took it on a trip to Hawaii, and I was very pleased with the photo quality and even the videos.  It was easy to carry in a pocket.  As others have mentioned, this camera does quite well in dim light.  The default settings are just what I want most of the time, but there are different modes that are fun to play with.  It accepts xD and SD chips.  A separate button for video mode simplifies video recording.DOWNSIDE:  The battery life was not as good as my Fujifilm F10, and this may be because the front slide that turns the camera on can too easily be opened in one's pocket.  There is no optical viewfinder, and in bright sunlight the LCD screen is hard to see.  It is too easy to put your finger in front of the lens.  Also, I would prefer more than 3x optical zoom (however, but with this size of camera without an extended lens, it does quite well).  The audio portion of videos can be muddled in crowds or in noisy locations, and some music is quite distorted (although I have not found any digital camera in this price range that does as well).  The video button is small and awkward to push, and first-time users often assume it is the power button, inadvertently starting a video recording when only wanting to turn the camera on.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole Baker
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera for a couple days, but so far I REALLY like it. My old camera was a casio exilim that I got about 4-5 years ago, and it finally bonked, so my daddy got me the finepix. One of the first things I noticed was that the finepix has a much clearer screen. I had tested a finepix in the store prior to receiving mine as a gift, and I noticed that it had one of the clearest screens, even in comparison to some of the more expensive digital cameras. Trying out the features, I was very happy with the facial recognition, auto focus, stabilization, etc. because I tend to have an unsteady hand and normally take pictures that are out of focus. I also like the pre-set photo options for situations such as low light, ebay photos, and others and how the camera automatically adjusts lighting, flash, etc. I appreciate that the zoom is internal - my old camera's zoom popped out of the front of the camera, and that just annoyed me. I also like the macro setting - I think still life/conceptual type photos are the coolest. I noticed the shutter speed on the finepix is way better than on my old camera too. With my old camera, most of the pictures of my dog would turn out blurry or fuzzy because by the time I tried to capture a picture he would move. This camera is able to get clear shots of him. The video is also much clearer than it was with my old camera. Also, I am very pale, and most cameras make me look like a washed out zombie, but with this camera I looked like a normal (though still pale) human. I think the only thing I don't like so far is the software, but I have an SD card reader and will probably start using that so I can bypass using the software all together. I'd definitely recommend this camera for anyone who wants random shots of family, friends, pets, nature, etc. as well as short videos. The photo quality looks very good on my macbook, although I have not yet printed any photos. Although the camera is not professional quality, for the price it exceeds expectations!

Reviews.Title: Great digital camera
Reviews.Author: Glenn D. Rych "Average Professional"
Reviews.Content: I am a terrible photographer most of the time. I have had several " good " digital cameras in the past. But this one is very easy to use and actually makes my pictures look good. I would recommend it for small size, ease of use, and great pictures even for those of us who are not "photographers."

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper "amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Fujifilm A600 that had a short life span.  I hope this camera last longer.  I bought this camera because of it's size, weight, and fact that the lens does not stick out of the camera.  I can keep the camera in my pocket, turn it on, and take it out to be discreet if need be.I do not like the face recognition and analyzing feature unless I am specifically taking a picture of a person.  It slows down the camera option.  Also, you can not disable automatic review.  The minimum is 1.5 seconds which also slows down the speed at which you can take pictures.I do like the second button for rapid movie recording.  Video quality is alright.  It is nothing to brag about but decent enough for YouTube.  I have yet to print any photos but picture quality on the monitor is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic, now a loyal Fujifilm customer!
Reviews.Author: Kristian S. Wesslen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after a lot of research. My criteria were: under $200, good quality, SD compatible, stylish and a slide cover (protected lens). I was thinking about purchasing one of the waterproof olympus's but decided against it after looking at the focus problems and lower image quality.This camera was absolutely amazing! Opening the box you realize what a great job Fuji has done. The camera's battery charges in a cradle (you have to remove the battery from the camera) which is nice because it allows one battery to charge while you use the camera with another battery, instead of connecting the camera to a charger.What was most important to me was ease of use and general image quality. I hate waiting for a camera to turn on and the down time in between pictures. This camera with a high speed SD card is lightning fast. You don't have to worry about fiddling with settings or adjusting it. It truly is a point and shoot. Everytime I clicked the shutter I was left with a great image. With the option of double imaging, the camera will take a picture with and without the flash within the same second, allowing you to chose the best.All around this camera is great. Unfortunately the camera was stolen on my last vacation and now I will be buying the new Fujifilm f30.

Reviews.Title: Stunning photos and lovely video, Must buy!
Reviews.Author: S. Zettee "Darkblade"
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent. I've used FujiFilm products all my life and they've never failed to impress, this is no exception. This camera has 10 Megapixel and 3x optical zoom with many options to make sure you GET the shot you like including certain lighting or no red eye display! Video is in MP4 format and the pack-in suggest Quicktime (As it's included)However I don't suggest installing it, you can get any kind of MP4 playing software that surpasses Quicktime. with a rechargable lithium ion battery and great battery life, you'll be able to take a large amount of pictures and movies (Depending on what size SD card you get)only bad thing is you can't use the cam as a web cam and you can't "use" the camera in USB mode.However the photo quality is superb and video quality is perfect which makes up for the USB mode flaw. An excellent camera for an Excellent price, Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Good Price
Reviews.Author: Charlie W. Bedgood
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great deal for the money. It shoots good quality pictures and video.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Doyle "Mike Doyle"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera especially for kids.  The on/off slide protects the lens.  Takes great pictures and does video.  Bought one for Christmas, liked it so much, we bought another one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Corey Turner "The Musician"
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about digital cameras first off. I've owned four, and I think this is the one I'm going to stick with. I obtained an open box model and it works fine, no little quircks so far (owned for two weeks so far). The pictures taken on this small little bugger can be displayed on your high def tv still tight and crisp. The camera is pretty user friendly (even for me!). The video mode is actually much better in terms of qaulity then I expected. Additional little things like the 'auction mode' offered for pictures (three even four framed pictures) are always a welcomed touch (and I have seen some heavy use out of this).Really enthused with its easy navigating, sleek looks, and qaulity all for the right price. Although I'm not a photographer nor am I savvy with cameras, I find this to be well worth the price. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: A MUST HAVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Maria T. Sanchez "notmia"
Reviews.Content: Don't let the brand fool you.  I took this camera to my Peru trip and it took great pictures!!!!!  The movie side of it was superb!!  The colors are vivid, the sound is way too cool!!!!!  I recommend this100% to any one who likes simplicty!  It is simple and easy to use, just the way I like it.  Very pleased with this purchased!!!!

Reviews.Title: Budget Camera that does well.
Reviews.Author: Intuitions
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera due to my Samsung L200's freezing of the lens.  I decided to buy a camera without a lens sticking out so that I don't break another camera again.  The Fuji z-20 is just what I was looking for.  People are saying the images are pixilated or noisy - yes - if you keep it on automatic and bad settings.  Try the manual mode and lower ISO speeds, along with brightness control.  This fixed the problem.  I uploaded a couple shots of me - and you can see the camera does well.  Don't give up on it.  I give it 5 stars.  $99 and free shipping, a deal.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: P. MCCALL
Reviews.Content: I think this camera would have been great, because it had several great features and took very good pictures, however we had to return it because it was malfunctioning and randomly deleting photos. We will probably purchase a Canon instead.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: M. E. Miller
Reviews.Content: pros:this is a great camera. its replacing my old finepix A500 (which holds the same type of memory card, to my pleasant surprise); it takes clear pictures, great with action photography, and has a load of functions ive used and some i have yet to discover.cons:battery- im so used to my old fugifilm where i could carry spare lithiums if my batteries died. cant do that with a lithium ion camera. plus, the battery has to be taken out to charge, so i cant use the camera simultaneously. id recommend buying a spare lithium ion.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: K. Xu
Reviews.Content: This one takes very nice pictures!!!I had a Cannon Powershot but the lense broke in less than a year after the purchase.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST DIGITAL CAMERA UNDER $200
Reviews.Author: L. Moore
Reviews.Content: I can go on and on about this camera so I will make it brief. I know alot about digital camera's and I must say this one is the best one for under $200. The quality is 10MP and for those of you who dont know what that means...its simply GREAT QUALITY. It takes pics so clear you will think they are High Definition. It is small enough to fit in your pocket. The only bad thing about this camera is that the internal memory only holds like 10 pictures OR 2 minutes of video footage. If u buy an SanDisk memory card sold on Amazon( which is about 15-20 dollars) you can increase the amount of memory. I purchased one for my cousin and I am buying one more for me...I love this camera....If you are like me and dont know alot about cameras and you want a great digital one....BUY THIS ONE!!!

Reviews.Title: quality compact camera
Reviews.Author: W. Chan "iheartiindie"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  I'm a college student, and its exactly what I need.It looks more compact than in the picture, and the quality of the pictures are great.  The settings are easy to maneuver, and the movie quality is excellent.  I would suggest waiting for the price of the camera lowering to $124 before purchasing.  It happens like ... once a week or biweekly.It's a simple, easy-to-use and an overall great camera for people who are looking for a basic.

Reviews.Title: worth every cent!
Reviews.Author: A. Bruce "scrapbook girl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my teen daughter as a Christmas present.  It is compact, easy to use, and takes great pics! I am actually planning on buying myself one!!

Reviews.Title: Great small camera, perfect for snapshots and parties
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Weiss "WRX Navigation"
Reviews.Content: The size, resolution, and fact that the lens doesn't extend makes this camera an ideal unit for going out with friends. The compact and simple design makes it very easy to use. The 10MP resolution results in great quality pictures. The slide cover and non extending lens means you can toss it in your pocket or backpack without too much worry. Flash is sufficient for most normal indoor shooting. Focuses fast and accurately. I actually gave this as a gift and would definitely buy this again. Great price and performance.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Buel "hummingbird"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. Awesome is her word for it. It has lots of extra features that she really enjoys using. This is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: M. Brummitt
Reviews.Content: great little camera.I would recommend this to any one.Have had no problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Young mom "Lina A"
Reviews.Content: I received my camera a few weeks ago, and initially had some trouble figuring out why the pics I was taking weren't being saved onto my SD card.  I read the manual and discovered I had to "format" it (which took two seconds) so that was solved.  Otherwise, I love the quality of the pictures; the menu is clear and easy to read and navigate; it uploads beautifully (didn't use the included software, just went straight from SD card to laptop); and of course, I love how sleek and lightweight it is!  I have a young child, and when I want to take pictures, I don't want a lot of lag time between when I press the button and it taking the picture.  My old camera took like 3 or 4 seconds (yes, it was horrible), but this one is very fast!  I'm very happy with my purchase, and ecstatic to have found it about $40 cheaper here on Amazon.com when compared to Target.com where I almost bought from!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: C. Parrott "WillnLuke"
Reviews.Content: Flash is so bright it drowns out the pictures. Makes everyones faces look whited out!  Outside pictures look ok.  Many pictures come out blurry because the flash is off. Taking indoor pictures it looks too dark without flash and too bright with flash. Poor quality I'm returning it!

Reviews.Title: great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: KG
Reviews.Content: low light ability is great on this little fuji. And the video ability is beyond it's price point. I have two dslrs that I shoot serious photos with, but you can't beat this little thing for portability. I just started using the video feature and it is really good for what it is. As a tag along camera or one that you put in your pocket, it is really good. Low light shots are a lot better than more expensive p/s type cameras I have tried. Even 800 iso is not that bad.

Reviews.Title: Great Movies Poor photos
Reviews.Author: Y-Not "John"
Reviews.Content: I used this for more than a year and finally got rid of it.  The photo quality was very disappointing and was finally forced to carry my old Canon digital elph for pics.  The movie quality was very good and I loved the MP4 (lots of video very small files) format but just could not stand the pictures.The ergonomics were not the best.  Worst feature was a very small separate movie button very hard to turn on and off.  It was nice having a separate button for pics and movies but still. . . . . .Another bad feature  was it is very easy to put the left fingers over the lens.  This is the result of a good feature in that the lens never protrudes from the camera but then you have no reference point and the fingers get over the lens very easily especially if you rest fingers on top of camera.Just finally had to sell it - believe me you can do a lot better than this camera.  I replaced it with a Nikon coolpix L20 on closeout at Sams for $59 - Great photos excellent video - although AVI format but at least I carry one camera again.

Reviews.Title: love the Fuji
Reviews.Author: S. spaulding
Reviews.Content: I have allways been an Olympus man, but until I got my pictures procesed, I will change to Fuji!!

Reviews.Title: excellent beginner camera
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: I have the 7MP version of this camera and it takes good pictures. They're a little grainy, but I haven't seen a digital picture that isn't grainy at full size. The files are great for printing.The camera itself has stood up to rain and being dropped. The controls are easy to work and the handstrap is very sturdy. The battery lasts forever, too!Sometimes the flash can be a little too bright if you're too close to your subject, but that can easily be solved by backing away slightly or playing with angles. The macro images and portrait images are absolutely beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, Looks Nice, Mediocre Pictures
Reviews.Author: Tyler Jensen
Reviews.Content: The camera looks sleep, is fairly small, and has a cool design, but its user interface is pretty confusing to use, and I personally don't think the pictures are that great, a lot of mine turn out grainy and have to be photoshopped to look decent. You can find better

ProductInfo.Features:
10-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom with Picture Stabilization; 2.5-inch LCD display
Face Detection optimizes focus/exposure for up to 10 faces; Blog Mode copies 640 x 480 version of image for easy upload
Wirelessly transfer images to IrSimple-equipped devices, including other digital cameras
Stores images on xD or SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Jet Black)
